foreignData.name: Abtrünniger Engel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Der Abtrünnige Engel wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.
Grenzwert Der Abtrünnige Engel erhält +3/+3, ist schwarz, verursacht Trampelschaden und hat „Opfere zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine Kreatur." (Du hast den Grenzwert erreicht, solange sieben oder mehr Karten in deinem Friedhof sind.)

foreignData.name: Ángel caprichoso
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
El Ángel caprichoso no se gira al atacar.
Umbral El Ángel caprichoso obtiene +3/+3, es negro, tiene la habilidad de arrollar y tiene: "Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica una criatura". (Tienes umbral mientras haya siete o más cartas en tu cementerio.)

foreignData.name: Ange rétive
foreignData.text:
Vol
Attaquer avec l'Ange rétive ne la fait pas s'engager.
Seuil — l'Ange rétive gagne +3/+3, est noire, a le piétinement, et a « Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez une créature. » (Vous avez le seuil tant qu'il y a sept cartes ou plus dans votre cimetière.)

foreignData.name: Angelo Ribelle
foreignData.text:
Volare
L'Angelo Ribelle attacca senza TAPpare.
Soglia - l'Angelo Ribelle prende +3/+3, è nero, ha travolgere e ha "All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica una creatura" (hai soglia fintanto che ci sono almeno sette carte nel tuo cimitero).

foreignData.name: Anjo Inconstante
foreignData.text:
Voar
Anjo Inconstante não é virado para atacar.
Limiar - Anjo Inconstante recebe +3/+3, é preto, tem a habilidade de atropelar e tem "No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique uma criatura." (Você atinge o limiar desde que haja sete ou mais cards em seu cemitério.)

name: Wayward Angel
originalText:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Wayward Angel to tap.
Threshold Wayward Angel gets +3/+3, is black, has trample, and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature." (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

rulings.text: When you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, this card is black. It is not white and black.

text:
Flying, vigilance
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Wayward Angel gets +3/+3, is black, has trample, and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."
